snippet.title: Deep Sleep: Labyrinth of the Forsaken - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Your brother is dead... or is he? Question your dreams and reality in this all new horror point-and-click adventure from veteran developer scriptwelder.
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1868360/Deep_Sleep_Labyrinth_of_the_Forsaken/

After Amy's estranged brother turns up dead, she finds herself doubting his sanity as she begins the task of putting his affairs in order. But the more she reads into his rambling journals on lucid dreaming and the realm beyond the waking, the more she starts to wonder if he might not be onto something. And maybe, just maybe, her brother isn't actually dead... but finding him will push Amy to the limits of her nightmares and sanity.
